column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////The place is soooooo good. I plan on going back repeatedly to try all the delicious things that called to me from behind the glass! We did make the mistake of going on Sunday afternoon
column2: and it was CRAZY busy. I would probably go a lot earlier or just get my order to go next time because it was hell trying to get a table in that mess.
